mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(0.8*b.cargo_interest+b.cargo_interest_puchas),0) from agent a LEFT join ( SELECT agent_org_id,cargo_interest,cargo_interest_puchas from finance_account )b on b.agent_org_id=a.id where b.agent_org_id is not null and a.org_id =#{orgId} and a.invite_level=1
